## RenderOptions interface

APP Render参数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RenderOptions 
```

## Example


```js
createApp(moduleGetter).render({id: 'root', viewName: 'main', ssrKey: 'eluxInitStore'})
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id?](./vue-web.renderoptions.id.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> 挂载 Dom 的 id，默认为 <code>root</code> |
|  [ssrKey?](./vue-web.renderoptions.ssrkey.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> SSR脱水数据的变量名称，默认为 <code>eluxInitStore</code> |
|  [viewName?](./vue-web.renderoptions.viewname.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> 根视图名称，默认为 <code>main</code> |
